name: Pet Fashions
description:
Dress Up – Little Pet Salon :
Welcome to Little Pet Salon, the world of little cute pets and you. Your imagination and creativeness is unlimited and you can decorate cute pets for fabulous events based on your customer requirements.
The real journey started when a little girl known as Jasmine wanted to start her own Cute Pretty Pet Salon and she got a big helping had from Gracy. Gracy helped little Jasmine to start the Pet Salon and also helped in dress up cute little pretty pets for fabulous occasions.
We requested Gracy to help the people who are in need of assistance in setting up their own Pet Salons on mobiles and tablets. Well.. Gracy is so generous and expressed her willingness to support the people to setup their salons. Thanks .. Gracy kudos. Gracy will be your helping assistant to build the salon for you.
Now its time to Play and Build your own Pet Salon:
1. With the help of Gracy, pick up your first order
2. Decorate pet with cute dresses and accessories like caps, goggles, ties, necklace and toys according to the need shown in preview picture
3. Collect stars and coins for each order execution
4. Complete many orders as possible to accumulate stars and coins
Here are the list of Fabulous features of Pet Salon:
1. Supported in 15+ languages. Start your Salon in your own language
2. Infinite game play with hundreds of decoration elements that includes Wide range of cool shirts, caps, goggles, hair and ties.
3. Excellent quality HD graphics and fully optimised to match native look and feel, performance
4. Beautiful and soothing music to relax your mind
5. Basic internet connection will do as there is less amount of data travels from server to mobile and viceversa
6. No need to look for updates, when there is an update app automatically find out and informs you
Wow… What are you waiting for? Go ahead Serve customers, earn money, and make your pets more happy
